articles.description: Bryan Adams has apologised for his swear word rant blaming the Chinese for coronavirus in a controversial post
articles.content:
Bryan Adams has done a U-turn on his damning comments blaming the Chinese for coronavirus. 
The rock star, 60, spiralled into a rant spitting out swear words over his cancelled gigs amid the COVID-19 outbreak.
In a controversial post, the singer sparked out… [+2601 chars]

articles.description: The Oscar-winning actress, 44, said she 'couldn't be more excited' as she's set to headline two romantic comedies for the streaming service, titled Your Place Or Mine; and The Cactus.
articles.content:

articles.title: Chrissy Teigen pushes back after she's accused of copying chef : 'I have never stolen a recipe' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The exchange unfolded when the user accused Teigen, 34, of copying recipes from others in a thread on the social media site.
articles.content:

articles.title: Lucifer season 5: 'Stop!' Mazikeen star Lesley-Ann Brandt issues strong warning to fans - Express
articles.description: LUCIFER season 5 seemed like it was just around the corner with production about to start on the epic finale. Unfortunately, filming has been put on hold amid the coronavirus pandemic.

articles.title: Blue Peter: New presenter to be unveiled during lockdown - BBC News
articles.description: Mwaka Mudenda will join the Blue Peter team virtually - and be tasked with breaking a world record.
articles.content:
Blue Peter usually introduces its new presenters doing something dramatic and daring, like jumping out of a plane.
But on Thursday, its 39th presenter - Mwaka Mudenda - will be unveiled virtually from home due to the UK's lockdown restrictions.

articles.title: Reading and Leeds festival cancelled due to coronavirus - The Guardian
articles.description: Ticket holders can choose to get refunds or roll tickets over to 2021 event
articles.content:
